About.Title: About Image Explorer
About.Paragraph1: This application allows users to search and explore high-quality images using the <unsplashLink>Unsplash API</unsplashLink>. It features live search, image results, pagination, and a responsive interface.
About.Paragraph2: Built as part of the <rsSchoolLink>RS School React course</rsSchoolLink>.

NotFound.Title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFound.Description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.

Error.Title: Something went wrong!
Error.Description: Please check your internet connection or try again later.
